data.name: Capoo Pals 螢幕貓蟲咖波
data.detailed_description:
Mac Version launched


关于软件




A completely stress-free desktop pet that heals your boredom at work and school
Let the cute and funny Capoo accompany you every moment of using the computer






Use the mouse to have a fun interaction with Capoo!






Collect bugcats books, many unknown Capoo and bugcats are waiting for you to discover and collect.




Let's think~


Does it make you feel lonely when you are alone with your computer?
Are you tired of the same presentations and information on the screen when you go to work?
Feeling drained when you've been working on your term report all day?

At this time, let Capoo and the bugcats accompany you to restore your vitality~

Now, the popular and cute Capoo & bugcats are officially knocking on your door!

Capoo will bring all kinds of bugcats to accompany you through every moment in front of the computer screen



Capoo and the bugcats , with the wallpaper of Capoo outdoor event, will make you full of energy every day!
Interact with the Capoo on the desktop and let their funny expressions keep you in a good mood!
Assisting Capoo to clean up the poop on the desktop can make them change from helpless to happy

Now, let Capoo and the bugcats become good partners on your screen and desktop!

data.short_description: Completely stress-free desktop games, heal your boredom at work and school Let the cute and funny Capoo accompany you every moment of using the computer

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
  • 操作系统: Windows 10
  • 处理器: intel i5
  • 内存: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX 版本: 11
  • 网络: 宽带互联网连接
  • 存储空间: 需要 200 MB 可用空间
  • 附注事项: screen resolution 1920 x 1080
pc_requirements.recommended:
推荐配置:
  • 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
  • 操作系统: Windows 10
  • DirectX 版本: 12
  • 网络: 宽带互联网连接
  • 附注事项: screen resolution 1920 x 1080

mac_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 操作系统: macOS Sonoma 14.0
  • 处理器: 1.6 GHz dual-core Intel Core i5
  • 内存: 8 GB RAM
  • 显卡: Intel UHD Graphics 617
  • 网络: 宽带互联网连接
  • 存储空间: 需要 200 MB 可用空间
  • 附注事项: screen resolution 1440 x 900
mac_requirements.recommended:
推荐配置:
  • 操作系统: macOS Sonoma 14.0
  • 处理器: Apple M2
  • 内存: 8 GB RAM
  • 显卡: Intel UHD Graphics 617
  • 网络: 宽带互联网连接
  • 存储空间: 需要 500 MB 可用空间
  • 附注事项: screen resolution 1680 x 1050
